actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend the act prohibiting certain fishing in U.S. waters in order to revise the penalty for violating the provisions of such act.

summary.text: Revises the penalty for prohibited fishing in the territorial waters of the United States to include the forefeiture of the monetary value of the fish taken in violation of law (presently, the fish themselves are forefeited).

titles.title: A bill to amend the act prohibiting certain fishing in U.S. waters in order to revise the penalty for violating the provisions of such act.
